arts.ttl: Palmer set to miss England squad through injury
arts.sum: Enzo Maresca expects Cole Palmer to miss England's World Cup qualifiers after suffering a "muscular injury" which will require a scan on Monday.

arts.ttl: Arsenal 1-0 Chelsea: Enzo Maresca comments on ineffective attacking display, Cole Palmer injury blow
arts.sum: Chelsea head coach Enzo Maresca acknowledges that his side need to find an extra gear against teams competing at the top of the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta points finger at Arsenal players despite 'important' Chelsea win
arts.sum: Arsenal beat Chelsea 1-0 to cement their status as Liverpool's closest challengers at the top of the Premier League table, with Mikel Merino scoring the first-half winner

arts.ttl: Arsenal end three-game winless run with London derby victory against Chelsea
arts.sum: Mikel Merinoâ€™s header secured a 1-0 win for the second-placed Gunners.
